remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法枚举指定的图元文件中包含的记录。This method enumerates the records contained in the specified metafile. 每个记录将分别发送到由参数指定的回调方法 `callback` 。Each record is individually sent to a callback method specified by the `callback` parameter. 通常，回调方法会调用 方法以 "播放" 或绘制记录。Typically, the callback method calls the method to "play back", or draw, the record. 如果回调方法调用 ，则它必须通过调用所枚举的 特定的方法来执行此操作 。If the callback method calls , it must do so by calling the method of the specific that is being enumerated. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个窗体，该窗体具有 作为其一个私有成员的。The following code example creates a form that has a as one of its private members. 方法调用 ，此方法将 `MetafileCallback` 为图元文件中的每个记录调用窗体的方法。The method calls , which calls the form's `MetafileCallback` method for each record in the metafile. `MetafileCallback` 方法调用 方法。The `MetafileCallback` method calls the method. 请注意， `MetafileCallback` 方法接收的记录数据为 ，但 方法要求记录数据是字节数组。Notice that the `MetafileCallback` method receives the record data as an , but the method expects the record data to be a byte array. 对的调用将 记录数据复制到字节数组，以便可以将其传递给 。The call to copies the record data to a byte array so that it can be passed to . remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法枚举指定的图元文件中包含的记录。This method enumerates the records contained in the specified metafile. 每个记录将分别发送到由参数指定的回调方法 `callback` 。Each record is individually sent to a callback method specified by the `callback` parameter. 通常，回调方法会调用 方法以 "播放" 或绘制记录。Typically, the callback method calls the method to "play back", or draw, the record. 如果回调方法调用 ，则它必须通过调用所枚举的 特定的方法来执行此操作 。If the callback method calls , it must do so by calling the method of the specific that is being enumerated. `destPoints`参数指定平行四边形的三个点。The `destPoints` parameter specifies three points of a parallelogram. 这三个 结构表示平行四边形的左上角、右上角和左下角。The three structures represent the upper-left, upper-right, and lower-left corners of the parallelogram. 第四个点是从前三个位置推断来形成平行四边形。The fourth point is extrapolated from the first three to form a parallelogram. 绘制的图元文件经过缩放和剪切，以适合平行四边形。The drawn metafile is scaled and sheared to fit the parallelogram. ## Examples 有关代码示例，请参阅 。For a code example, see .

span.span: Array of three structures that define a parallelogram that determines the size and location of the drawn metafile.

summary.span: 将指定 中的记录逐个发送到回调方法以在指定的平行四边形中显示。

span.span: Sends the records in the specified , one at a time, to a callback method for display in a specified parallelogram.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法枚举指定的图元文件中包含的记录。This method enumerates the records contained in the specified metafile. 每个记录将分别发送到由参数指定的回调方法 `callback` 。Each record is individually sent to a callback method specified by the `callback` parameter. 通常，回调方法会调用 方法以 "播放" 或绘制记录。Typically, the callback method calls the method to "play back", or draw, the record. 如果回调方法调用 ，则它必须通过调用所枚举的 特定的方法来执行此操作 。If the callback method calls , it must do so by calling the method of the specific that is being enumerated. `destPoints`参数指定平行四边形的三个点。The `destPoints` parameter specifies three points of a parallelogram. 这三个 结构表示平行四边形的左上角、右上角和左下角。The three structures represent the upper-left, upper-right, and lower-left corners of the parallelogram. 第四个点是从前三个位置推断来形成平行四边形。The fourth point is extrapolated from the first three to form a parallelogram. 绘制的图元文件经过缩放和剪切，以适合平行四边形。The drawn metafile is scaled and sheared to fit the parallelogram. ## Examples 有关代码示例，请参阅 。For a code example, see .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法枚举指定的图元文件中包含的记录。This method enumerates the records contained in the specified metafile. 每个记录将分别发送到由参数指定的回调方法 `callback` 。Each record is individually sent to a callback method specified by the `callback` parameter. 通常，回调方法会调用 方法以 "播放" 或绘制记录。Typically, the callback method calls the method to "play back", or draw, the record. 如果回调方法调用 ，则它必须通过调用所枚举的 特定的方法来执行此操作 。If the callback method calls , it must do so by calling the method of the specific that is being enumerated. ## Examples 有关代码示例，请参阅 。For a code example, see .

param.span: 要枚举的 。

span.span: to enumerate.

param.name: destPoints
param.span: 由三个 结构组成的数组，这三个结构定义一个用来确定所绘制图元文件的大小和位置的平行四边形。

span.span: Array of three structures that define a parallelogram that determines the size and location of the drawn metafile.

param.name: callback
param.span: 委托，它指定将图元文件记录发送到的方法。

span.span: delegate that specifies the method to which the metafile records are sent.

param.span: ，它指定所绘制图像的图像特性信息。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法枚举指定的图元文件中包含的记录。This method enumerates the records contained in the specified metafile. 每个记录将分别发送到由参数指定的回调方法 `callback` 。Each record is individually sent to a callback method specified by the `callback` parameter. 通常，回调方法会调用 方法以 "播放" 或绘制记录。Typically, the callback method calls the method to "play back", or draw, the record. 如果回调方法调用 ，则它必须通过调用所枚举的 特定的方法来执行此操作 。If the callback method calls , it must do so by calling the method of the specific that is being enumerated. `destPoints`参数指定平行四边形的三个点。The `destPoints` parameter specifies three points of a parallelogram. 这三个 结构表示平行四边形的左上角、右上角和左下角。The three structures represent the upper-left, upper-right, and lower-left corners of the parallelogram. 第四个点是从前三个位置推断来形成平行四边形。The fourth point is extrapolated from the first three to form a parallelogram. 绘制的图元文件经过缩放和剪切，以适合平行四边形。The drawn metafile is scaled and sheared to fit the parallelogram. 由参数指定的图像属性 `imageAttr` 替换在写入元文件时指定的属性。The image attributes specified by the `imageAttr` parameter replace those specified when the metafile was written. ## Examples 有关代码示例，请参阅 。For a code example, see .

summary.span: 将 中选定矩形内的记录逐个发送到回调方法以在指定的平行四边形中显示。

span.span: Sends the records in a selected rectangle from a , one at a time, to a callback method for display in a specified parallelogram.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法枚举指定的图元文件中包含的记录。This method enumerates the records contained in the specified metafile. 每个记录将分别发送到由参数指定的回调方法 `callback` 。Each record is individually sent to a callback method specified by the `callback` parameter. 通常，回调方法会调用 方法以 "播放" 或绘制记录。Typically, the callback method calls the method to "play back", or draw, the record. 如果回调方法调用 ，则它必须通过调用所枚举的 特定的方法来执行此操作 。If the callback method calls , it must do so by calling the method of the specific that is being enumerated. `destPoints`参数指定平行四边形的三个点。The `destPoints` parameter specifies three points of a parallelogram. 这三个 结构表示平行四边形的左上角、右上角和左下角。The three structures represent the upper-left, upper-right, and lower-left corners of the parallelogram. 第四个点是从前三个位置推断来形成平行四边形。The fourth point is extrapolated from the first three to form a parallelogram. 绘制的图元文件经过缩放和剪切，以适合平行四边形。The drawn metafile is scaled and sheared to fit the parallelogram. 将忽略在参数所指定的矩形之外发生的任何绘制 `srcRect` 。Any drawing that takes place outside of the rectangle specified by the `srcRect` parameter is ignored. ## Examples 有关代码示例，请参阅 。For a code example, see .

summary.span: 将 中选定矩形内的记录逐个发送到回调方法以在指定的平行四边形中显示。

span.span: Sends the records in a selected rectangle from a , one at a time, to a callback method for display in a specified parallelogram.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法枚举指定的图元文件中包含的记录。This method enumerates the records contained in the specified metafile. 每个记录将分别发送到由参数指定的回调方法 `callback` 。Each record is individually sent to a callback method specified by the `callback` parameter. 通常，回调方法会调用 方法以 "播放" 或绘制记录。Typically, the callback method calls the method to "play back", or draw, the record. 如果回调方法调用 ，则它必须通过调用所枚举的 特定的方法来执行此操作 。If the callback method calls , it must do so by calling the method of the specific that is being enumerated. `destPoints`参数指定平行四边形的三个点。The `destPoints` parameter specifies three points of a parallelogram. 这三个 结构表示平行四边形的左上角、右上角和左下角。The three structures represent the upper-left, upper-right, and lower-left corners of the parallelogram. 第四个点是从前三个位置推断来形成平行四边形。The fourth point is extrapolated from the first three to form a parallelogram. 绘制的图元文件经过缩放和剪切，以适合平行四边形。The drawn metafile is scaled and sheared to fit the parallelogram. 将忽略在参数所指定的矩形之外发生的任何绘制 `srcRect` 。Any drawing that takes place outside of the rectangle specified by the `srcRect` parameter is ignored. ## Examples 有关代码示例，请参阅 。For a code example, see .

span.span: Images, Bitmaps, and Metafiles

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法枚举指定的图元文件中包含的记录。This method enumerates the records contained in the specified metafile. 每个记录将分别发送到由参数指定的回调方法 `callback` 。Each record is individually sent to a callback method specified by the `callback` parameter. 通常，回调方法会调用 方法以 "播放" 或绘制记录。Typically, the callback method calls the method to "play back", or draw, the record. 如果回调方法调用 ，则它必须通过调用所枚举的 特定的方法来执行此操作 。If the callback method calls , it must do so by calling the method of the specific that is being enumerated. `destPoints`参数指定平行四边形的三个点。The `destPoints` parameter specifies three points of a parallelogram. 这三个 结构表示平行四边形的左上角、右上角和左下角。The three structures represent the upper-left, upper-right, and lower-left corners of the parallelogram. 第四个点是从前三个位置推断来形成平行四边形。The fourth point is extrapolated from the first three to form a parallelogram. 绘制的图元文件经过缩放和剪切，以适合平行四边形。The drawn metafile is scaled and sheared to fit the parallelogram. 将忽略在参数所指定的矩形之外发生的任何绘制 `srcRect` 。Any drawing that takes place outside of the rectangle specified by the `srcRect` parameter is ignored. 由参数指定的图像属性 `imageAttr` 替换在写入元文件时指定的属性。The image attributes specified by the `imageAttr` parameter replace those specified when the metafile was written. ## Examples 有关代码示例，请参阅 。For a code example, see .

span.span: Sends the records in a selected rectangle from a , one at a time, to a callback method for display in a specified parallelogram using specified image attributes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法枚举指定的图元文件中包含的记录。This method enumerates the records contained in the specified metafile. 每个记录将分别发送到由参数指定的回调方法 `callback` 。Each record is individually sent to a callback method specified by the `callback` parameter. 通常，回调方法会调用 方法以 "播放" 或绘制记录。Typically, the callback method calls the method to "play back", or draw, the record. 如果回调方法调用 ，则它必须通过调用所枚举的 特定的方法来执行此操作 。If the callback method calls , it must do so by calling the method of the specific that is being enumerated. `destPoints`参数指定平行四边形的三个点。The `destPoints` parameter specifies three points of a parallelogram. 这三个 结构表示平行四边形的左上角、右上角和左下角。The three structures represent the upper-left, upper-right, and lower-left corners of the parallelogram. 第四个点是从前三个位置推断来形成平行四边形。The fourth point is extrapolated from the first three to form a parallelogram. 绘制的图元文件经过缩放和剪切，以适合平行四边形。The drawn metafile is scaled and sheared to fit the parallelogram. 将忽略在参数所指定的矩形之外发生的任何绘制 `srcRect` 。Any drawing that takes place outside of the rectangle specified by the `srcRect` parameter is ignored. 由参数指定的图像属性 `imageAttr` 替换在写入元文件时指定的属性。The image attributes specified by the `imageAttr` parameter replace those specified when the metafile was written. ## Examples 有关代码示例，请参阅 。For a code example, see .

span.span: Updates the clip region of this to exclude the area specified by a structure.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法 `rect` 从当前剪辑区域中排除参数指定的区域，并将生成的区域分配给 此的属性 。This method excludes the area specified by the `rect` parameter from the current clip region and assigns the resulting area to the property of this . ## Examples 下面的代码示例旨在与 Windows 窗体一起使用，并且它需要作为 `e` 事件处理程序的参数。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 此代码执行以下操作：The code performs the following actions: - 创建一个100像素 x 100 像素的矩形，该矩形的左上角位于坐标 (100，100) 。Creates a 100 pixel by 100 pixel rectangle whose upper-left corner is at the coordinate (100, 100). - 创建矩形定义的区域。Creates a region defined by the rectangle. - 将剪辑区域设置为排除矩形区域。Sets the clipping region to exclude the rectangular region. - 填充300像素 x 300 像素的矩形，该矩形的左上角位于坐标 (0，0) ，具有纯色的蓝色画笔。Fills a 300 pixel by 300 pixel rectangle whose upper-left corner is at the coordinate (0, 0) with a solid blue brush. 结果是一个蓝色矩形，其右下角附近缺少正方形区域。The result is a blue rectangle with a square region toward its lower-right corner missing. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples2#92](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples2/CPP/form1.cpp#92)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples2#92](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples2/CS/form1.cs#92)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples2#92](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples2/VB/form1.vb#92)]

param.span: 确定填充特性的 。

summary.span: 填充由 结构数组定义的闭合基数样条曲线的内部。

span.span: Fills the interior of a closed cardinal spline curve defined by an array of structures.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法填充经过数组中每个点的闭合基数样条的内部。This method fills the interior of a closed cardinal spline that passes through each point in the array. 如果最后一个点与第一个点不匹配，则从最后一个点向第一个点添加一个曲线段，以将其关闭。If the last point does not match the first point, an additional curve segment is added from the last point to the first point to close it. 点数组必须至少包含四个 结构。The array of points must contain at least four structures. 此方法使用默认张力0.5。This method uses a default tension of 0.5. ## Examples 下面的代码示例旨在与 Windows 窗体一起使用，并且它需要作为 `e` 事件处理程序的参数。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 此代码执行以下操作：The code performs the following actions: - 创建一个纯红色画笔。Creates a solid red brush. - 创建一个由四个点组成的数组，用于定义样条。Creates an array of four points to define a spline. - 填充屏幕上的曲线。Fills the curve on the screen. 曲线的默认张力为0.5。The curve has a default tension of 0.5. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples2#93](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples2/CPP/form1.cpp#93)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples2#93](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples2/CS/form1.cs#93)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples2#93](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples2/VB/form1.vb#93)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法填充经过数组中每个点的闭合基数样条的内部。This method fills the interior of a closed cardinal spline that passes through each point in the array. 如果最后一个点与第一个点不匹配，则从最后一个点向第一个点添加一个曲线段，以将其关闭。If the last point does not match the first point, an additional curve segment is added from the last point to the first point to close it. 点数组必须至少包含四个 结构。The array of points must contain at least four structures. 此方法使用默认张力0.5。This method uses a default tension of 0.5. ## Examples 下面的代码示例旨在与 Windows 窗体一起使用，并且它需要作为 `e` 事件处理程序的参数。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 此代码执行以下操作：The code performs the following actions: - 创建一个纯红色画笔。Creates a solid red brush. - 创建一个由四个点组成的数组，用于定义样条。Creates an array of four points to define a spline. - 将填充模式设置为 。Sets the fill mode to . - 填充屏幕上的曲线。Fills the curve on the screen. 曲线的默认张力为0.5。The curve has a default tension of 0.5. span.span: Fills the interior of a closed cardinal spline curve defined by an array of structures using the specified fill mode and tension.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法填充经过数组中每个点的闭合基数样条的内部。This method fills the interior of a closed cardinal spline that passes through each point in the array. 如果最后一个点与第一个点不匹配，则从最后一个点向第一个点添加一个曲线段，以将其关闭。If the last point does not match the first point, an additional curve segment is added from the last point to the first point to close it. 点数组必须至少包含四个 结构。The array of points must contain at least four structures. `tension`参数确定样条的形状。The `tension` parameter determines the shape of the spline. 如果参数的值 `tension` 为 0.0 f，此方法将绘制直线段以连接点。If the value of the `tension` parameter is 0.0F, this method draws straight line segments to connect the points. 通常， `tension` 参数小于或等于 1.0 f。Usually, the `tension` parameter is less than or equal to 1.0F. 超过 1.0 F 的值会产生异常结果。Values over 1.0F produce unusual results. ## Examples 下面的代码示例旨在与 Windows 窗体一起使用，并且它需要作为 `e` 事件处理程序的参数。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 此代码执行以下操作：The code performs the following actions: - 创建一个纯红色画笔。Creates a solid red brush. - 创建一个由四个点组成的数组，用于定义样条。Creates an array of four points to define a spline. - 将填充模式设置为 。Sets the fill mode to . - 将张力设置为1.0。Sets the tension to 1.0. - 填充屏幕上的曲线。Fills the curve on the screen. remarks.format: ## Remarks 包含一系列直线和曲线段。A consists of a series of line and curve segments. 如果参数表示的路径 `path` 未关闭，则从最后一个点向第一个点添加一个附加段以关闭路径。If the path represented by the `path` parameter is not closed, an additional segment is added from the last point to the first point to close the path. ## Examples 下面的代码示例旨在与 Windows 窗体一起使用，并且它需要作为 `e` 事件处理程序的参数。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 此代码执行以下操作：The code performs the following actions: - 创建一个纯红色画笔。Creates a solid red brush. - 创建图形路径对象。Creates a graphics path object. - 向图形路径添加一个椭圆。Adds an ellipse to the graphics path. - 填充屏幕上的路径。Fills the path on the screen. span.span: Fills the interior of a pie section defined by an ellipse specified by a structure and two radial lines.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法填充由椭圆的弧形定义的扇形区的内部以及与该圆弧的端点相交的两条射线。该椭圆由边框定义。This method fills the interior of a pie section defined by an arc of an ellipse and the two radial lines that intersect with the endpoints of the arc. The ellipse is defined by the bounding rectangle. 扇形区包含由和参数定义的两条射线 `startAngle` `sweepAngle` ，以及这些放射连线与椭圆的交集之间的弧线。The pie section consists of the two radial lines defined by the `startAngle` and `sweepAngle` parameters and the arc between the intersections of those radial lines with the ellipse. 如果 `sweepAngle` 参数大于360度或小于360度，则将其视为360度或-360 度。If the `sweepAngle` parameter is greater than 360 degrees or less than -360 degrees, it is treated as if it were 360 degrees or -360 degrees, respectively. ## Examples 下面的代码示例旨在与 Windows 窗体一起使用，并且它需要作为 `e` 事件处理程序的参数。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 此代码执行以下操作：The code performs the following actions: - 创建一个纯红色画笔。Creates a solid red brush. - 创建一个限定椭圆的矩形。Creates a rectangle that bounds an ellipse. - 定义相对于 x 轴) (的起始角度， (顺时针方向) 的扫描角度。Defines the start angle (relative to the x axis) and the sweep angle (both in a clockwise direction). - 在屏幕上填充椭圆的扇形区。Fills the pie-shaped area of the ellipse on the screen. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples2#104](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples2/CPP/form1.cpp#104)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples2#104](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples2/CS/form1.cs#104)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples2#104](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples2/VB/form1.vb#104)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 数组中的每两个连续点指定多边形的一侧。Every two consecutive points in the array specify a side of the polygon. 此外，如果最后一个点和第一个点不重合，则它们指定多边形的右端。In addition, if the last point and the first point do not coincide, they specify the closing side of the polygon. ## Examples 下面的代码示例旨在与 Windows 窗体一起使用，并且它需要作为 `e` 事件处理程序的参数。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 此代码执行以下操作：The code performs the following actions: - 创建一个稳定的蓝色画笔。Creates a solid blue brush. - 创建用于定义多边形的七个点的数组。Creates an array of seven points to define a polygon. - 填充屏幕上的多边形区域。Fills the polygonal area on the screen. remarks.format: ## Remarks 数组中的每两个连续点指定多边形的一侧。Every two consecutive points in the array specify a side of the polygon. 此外，如果最后一个点和第一个点不重合，则它们指定多边形的右端。In addition, if the last point and the first point do not coincide, they specify the closing side of the polygon. ## Examples 下面的代码示例旨在与 Windows 窗体一起使用，并且它需要作为 `e` 事件处理程序的参数。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 此代码执行以下操作：The code performs the following action: - 创建一个稳定的蓝色画笔。Creates a solid blue brush. - 创建用于定义多边形的七个点的数组。Creates an array of seven points to define a polygon. - 将填充模式设置为 。Sets the fill mode to . - 填充屏幕上的多边形区域。Fills the polygonal area on the screen. remarks.format: ## Remarks 参数的值 `intention` 指定方法在开始刷新后立即返回，而值 指定该方法在返回前等待，直到任何现有操作完成。A value of for the `intention` parameter specifies that the method return immediately after beginning the flush, while a value of specifies that the method wait before returning until any existing operations finish.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 应始终调用 方法以释放 由方法创建的和相关资源 。You should always call the method to release the and related resources created by the method. 即使显示设备有关联的 ICM 颜色配置文件， [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)] 默认情况下也不会使用该配置文件。Even if the display device has an associated ICM color profile, [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)] will not use that profile by default. 若要为启用 ICM ，请在 传递 hdc (并将 ICM_ON) 传递到函数后，从 hdc 构造 `SetICMMode` 。To enable ICM for a , construct the from an HDC after you pass the HDC (and ICM_ON) to the `SetICMMode` function. 然后， 将根据与显示设备关联的 ICM 配置文件调整所完成的任何绘制。Then any drawing done by the will be adjusted according to the ICM profile associated with the display device. 启用 ICM 将导致性能下降。Enabling ICM will result in slower performance. 在调用时，设备上下文的状态 (映射模式、逻辑单元和 like) 可能会影响由完成的呈现 。The state of the device context (mapping mode, logical unit, and the like) at the time you call can affect rendering done by the . ## Examples 下面的代码示例旨在与 Windows 窗体一起使用，并且它需要作为 `e` 事件处理程序的参数。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 此代码执行以下操作：The code performs the following action: - 创建内部指针类型变量 `hdc` ，并将其设置为窗体图形对象的设备上下文的句柄。Creates an internal pointer type variable `hdc` and sets it to the handle to the device context of the graphics object of the form. - 使用创建新的图形对象 `hdc` 。Creates a new graphics object using `hdc`. - 使用) 屏幕上的新图形对象 (绘制矩形。Draws a rectangle with the new graphics object (on the screen). - 使用释放新的图形对象 `hdc` 。Releases the new graphics object using `hdc`. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3#118](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3/CPP/form1.cpp#118)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3#118](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3/CS/form1.cs#118)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3#118](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3/VB/form1.vb#118)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 应始终调用 方法以释放 由方法创建的和相关资源 。You should always call the method to release the and related resources created by the method. 即使显示设备有关联的 ICM 颜色配置文件， [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)] 默认情况下也不会使用该配置文件。Even if the display device has an associated ICM color profile, [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)] will not use that profile by default. 若要为启用 ICM ，请在 传递 hdc (并将 ICM_ON) 传递到函数后，从 hdc 构造 `SetICMMode` 。To enable ICM for a , construct the from an HDC after you pass the HDC (and ICM_ON) to the `SetICMMode` function. 然后， 将根据与显示设备关联的 ICM 配置文件调整所完成的任何绘制。Then any drawing done by the will be adjusted according to the ICM profile associated with the display device. 启用 ICM 将导致性能下降。Enabling ICM will result in slower performance. 在调用时，设备上下文的状态 (映射模式、逻辑单元和 like) 可能会影响由完成的呈现 。The state of the device context (mapping mode, logical unit, and the like) at the time you call can affect rendering done by the . 设备句柄通常用于查询特定的打印机功能。The device handle is typically used to query specific printer capabilities.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 应始终调用 方法以释放 由方法创建的和相关资源 。You should always call the method to release the and related resources created by the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例旨在与 Windows 窗体一起使用，并且它需要作为 `e` 事件处理程序的参数，以及 `thisForm` 示例的。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler, as well as `thisForm`, the for the example. 此代码执行以下操作：The code performs the following actions: - 创建新的内部指针变量 `hwnd` ，并将其设置为该示例的窗体的句柄。Creates a new internal pointer variable `hwnd` and sets it to the handle of the example's form. - 从句柄创建新的。Creates a new from the handle. - 使用红笔将矩形绘制到新的 。Draws a rectangle to the new using a red pen. - 释放新的 。Disposes the new . remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果图像具有索引像素格式，则此方法将引发异常，并出现消息 "无法从具有索引像素格式的图像创建图形对象。"If the image has an indexed pixel format, this method throws an exception with the message, "A Graphics object cannot be created from an image that has an indexed pixel format." 下面的列表显示了索引像素格式。The indexed pixel formats are shown in the following list. - - - 您可以通过使用方法将索引图像另存为另一种格式 ，然后检索 新图像的对象。You can save the indexed image as another format by using the method and then retrieve a object for the new image. 如果图像具有以下任意像素格式，则此方法也会引发异常。This method also throws an exception if the image has any of the following pixel formats. - - - - 应始终调用 方法以释放 由方法创建的和相关资源 。You should always call the method to release the and related resources created by the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例旨在与 Windows 窗体一起使用，并且它需要作为 `e` 事件处理程序的参数。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 此代码执行以下操作：The code performs the following action: - 从示例文件夹中 SampImag.jpg 图形文件创建。Creates an from a graphics file SampImag.jpg in the example folder. - 从创建一个 。Creates a from the . - 通过填充图像中的矩形来更改图像。Alters the image by filling a rectangle within it. - 将绘制 到屏幕。Draws the to the screen. - 释放创建的 。Releases the created . [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3#120](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3/CPP/form1.cpp#120)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3#120](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3/CS/form1.cs#120)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3#120](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3/VB/form1.vb#120)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法的目的 是在 [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)] 显示使用每像素8位时，使能够生成更高质量的半色调。The purpose of the method is to enable [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)] to produce a better quality halftone when the display uses 8 bits per pixel. 若要使用半色调调色板显示图像，请使用以下过程。To display an image using the halftone palette, use the following procedure. ## Examples 下面的代码示例旨在与 Windows 窗体一起使用，并且它需要作为 `e` 事件处理程序的参数。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 此代码执行以下操作：The code performs the following actions: - 定义 gdi32.dll 的 Windows DLL 文件的互操作性 属性，其中包含所需的 [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)] 函数。Defines interoperability attributes for the Windows DLL file gdi32.dll, which contains the necessary [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)] functions. - 将 `SelectPalette` `RealizePalette` 该 DLL 中的和函数定义为外部函数。Defines the `SelectPalette` and `RealizePalette` functions in that DLL as external. - 从现有图像文件 SampImag.jpg (创建一个图像，该图像文件必须与示例代码文件位于同一文件夹中) 然后将图像绘制到屏幕上。Creates an image from an existing image file SampImag.jpg (which must be in the same folder as the example code file) and draws the image to the screen. - 创建内部指针类型变量，并分别将它们的值设置为图形对象和当前 Windows 半色调调色板的句柄。Creates internal pointer type variables and sets their values to the handle to the graphics object and to the current Windows halftone palette, respectively. - 选择并实现半色调调色板。Selects and realizes the halftone palette. - 使用参数创建新的图形对象 `hdc` 。Creates a new graphics object using the `hdc` parameter. - 再次绘制图像。Draws the image again. - 释放设备上下文的句柄。Releases the handle to the device context. 结果是示例图像的两个呈现：一个带有16位调色板，另一个与8位调色板一起提供。The result is two renderings of the sample image: one with the 16-bit palette and one with the 8-bit palette. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3#121](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3/CPP/form1.cpp#121)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3#121](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3/CS/form1.cs#121)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3#121](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3/VB/form1.vb#121)]

Attribute.AttributeName: [System.ComponentModel.EditorBrowsable(System.ComponentModel.EditorBrowsableState.Advanced)]
[<System.ComponentModel.EditorBrowsable(System.ComponentModel.EditorBrowsableState.Advanced)>]

summary.span: 获取与此 关联的设备上下文的句柄。

span.span: Gets the handle to the device context associated with this .

returns.span: 与此 关联的设备上下文的句柄。

span.span: Handle to the device context associated with this .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设备上下文是基于的 Windows 结构 [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)] ，定义了一组图形对象及其关联的属性，以及影响输出的图形模式。The device context is a Windows structure based on [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)] that defines a set of graphical objects and their associated attributes, as well as the graphical modes that affect output. 此方法返回除字体之外的设备上下文。This method returns that device context with the exception of a font. 由于未选择字体，因此 使用从方法返回的句柄对方法的调用 将失败。Because a font is not selected, calls to the method using a handle returned from the method will fail. 对 和方法的调用 必须成对出现。Calls to the and methods must appear in pairs. 在和方法对的作用域中 ，通常只调用 [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)] 函数。During the scope of a and method pair, you usually make only calls to [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)] functions. 对于生成参数的的方法，此范围内的调用 [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)] 将 `hdc` 失败，并出现 `ObjectBusy` 错误。Calls in that scope made to [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)] methods of the that produced the `hdc` parameter fail with an `ObjectBusy` error. 此外， [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)] 将忽略 `hdc` 在后续操作中对参数的进行的任何状态更改。Also, [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)] ignores any state changes made to the of the `hdc` parameter in subsequent operations. ## Examples 下面的代码示例旨在与 Windows 窗体一起使用，并且它需要作为 `e` 事件处理程序的参数。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 该示例演示如何调用 Windows [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)] 函数以执行与方法相同的任务 [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)] 。The example illustrates calling a Windows [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)] function to perform the same task as a [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)] method. 此代码执行以下操作：The code performs the following actions: - 定义 gdi32.dll 的 WINDOWS DLL 文件的互操作性特性。Defines the interoperability attribute for the Windows DLL file gdi32.dll. 此 DLL 包含所需的 [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)] 函数。This DLL contains the desired [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)] function. - 将 该 DLL 中的函数定义为 external。Defines the function in that DLL as external. - 创建红色笔。Creates a red pen. - 使用笔在屏幕上使用方法绘制一个矩形 [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)] 。With the pen, draws a rectangle to the screen using the [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)] method. - 定义内部指针类型变量 `hdc` ，并将其值设置为窗体的设备上下文的句柄。Defines an internal pointer type variable `hdc` and sets its value to the handle to the device context of the form. - 使用函数在屏幕上绘制矩形 [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)] 。Draws a rectangle to the screen using the [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)] function. - 释放参数所表示的设备上下文 `hdc` 。Releases the device context represented by the `hdc` parameter. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3#122](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3/CPP/form1.cpp#122)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3#122](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3/CS/form1.cs#122)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3#122](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3/VB/form1.vb#122)]

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例旨在与 Windows 窗体一起使用，并且它需要作为 `e` 事件处理程序的参数。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 此代码执行以下操作：The code performs the following actions: - 使用 ARGB 坐标 (255、165、63、136) 创建任意颜色。Creates an arbitrary color with ARGB coordinates (255, 165, 63, 136). - 创建纯色画笔，并将其颜色设置为指定的颜色。Creates a solid brush and sets its color to the specified color. - 使用任意颜色填充椭圆。Fills an ellipse using the arbitrary color. - 创建第二种颜色，并将其值设置为最接近的系统 ARGB 颜色。Creates a second color and sets its value to the nearest system ARGB color. - 使用此颜色填充第二个椭圆。Fills a second ellipse with this color. 结果就是两个省略号：第一次用任意指定的颜色绘制，第二个绘制时的系统颜色与指定的颜色最接近。The result is two ellipses: the first drawn with the arbitrary specified color and the second drawn with the system color nearest the specified color. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3#123](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3/CPP/form1.cpp#123)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3#123](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3/CS/form1.cs#123)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3#123](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3/VB/form1.vb#123)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法将分配给 当前剪辑区域和由参数指定的矩形的交集所表示的区域的属性 `rect` 。This method assigns to the property of this the area represented by the intersection of the current clip region and the rectangle specified by the `rect` parameter. ## Examples 下面的代码示例旨在与 Windows 窗体一起使用，并且它需要作为 `e` 事件处理程序的参数。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 此代码执行以下操作：The code performs the following actions: - 创建 (0，0) 左上角的矩形，并将该剪辑区域设置为此矩形。Creates a rectangle with upper-left corner at (0, 0) and sets the clipping region to this rectangle. - 创建 (100，100) 左上角的第二个矩形，并将该剪辑区域设置为在第一个矩形) (的当前剪辑区域。Creates a second rectangle with upper-left corner at (100, 100) and sets the clipping region to the intersection of this rectangle and the current clipping region (the first rectangle). - 使用纯蓝色画笔填充包含上一个矩形的大矩形。Fills a large rectangle that includes both previous rectangles with a solid blue brush. - 将剪辑区域重置为无限。Resets the clipping region to infinite. - 在两个剪辑区域周围绘制矩形。Draws rectangles around the two clipping regions. 它对第一个剪辑矩形使用黑色钢笔，为第二个剪辑区域使用一个红笔。It uses a black pen for the first clipping rectangle and a red pen for the second clipping region. 结果是，只有两个矩形的交集用蓝色填充。The result is that only the intersection of the two rectangles is filled with blue. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3#124](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3/CPP/form1.cpp#124)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3#124](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3/CS/form1.cs#124)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3#124](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3/VB/form1.vb#124)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法将分配给 当前剪辑区域和由参数指定的区域的交集所表示的区域的属性 `region` 。This method assigns to the property of this the area represented by the intersection of the current clip region and the region specified by the `region` parameter. ## Examples 下面的代码示例旨在与 Windows 窗体一起使用，并且它需要作为 `e` 事件处理程序的参数。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 此代码执行以下操作：The code performs the following actions: - 创建一个 (0，0) 的左上角的矩形。Creates a rectangle with upper-left corner at (0, 0). - 创建区域并将其设置为矩形，并将剪辑区域设置为此区域。Creates a region and sets it to the rectangle, and sets the clipping region to this region. - 在 (100，100) 的左上角创建第二个矩形。Creates a second rectangle with upper-left corner at (100, 100). - 创建区域并将其设置为第二个矩形，并使用的合并模式将剪辑区域设置为此区域与当前剪辑区域 (第一个矩形) 的交集 。Creates a region and sets it to the second rectangle, and sets the clipping region to the intersection of this region and the current clipping region (the first rectangle) using a combine mode of . - 使用纯蓝色画笔填充包含先前区域的大矩形。Fills a large rectangle that includes both previous regions with a solid blue brush. - 将剪辑区域重置为无限。Resets the clipping region to infinite. - 在两个剪辑区域周围绘制矩形。Draws rectangles around the two clipping regions. 它对第一个剪辑区域使用黑色笔，为第二个剪辑区域使用红色笔。It uses a black pen for the first clipping region and a red pen for the second clipping region. 结果就是，只有两个区域的交集用蓝色填充。The result is that only the intersection of the two regions is filled with blue. remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例旨在与 Windows 窗体一起使用，并且它需要作为 `e` 事件处理程序的参数。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 此代码执行以下操作：The code performs the following actions: - 使用创建矩形剪辑区域，并将其设置为该窗体图形对象的剪辑区域 。Creates a rectangular clipping region and sets it as the clipping region for the graphics object of the form using . - 创建两个点，一个位于剪辑区域内，一个在外部。Creates two points, one inside the clipping region and one outside. - 测试每个点的可见性并仅绘制可见的点。Tests each of the points for visibility and draws only the visible one. 结果是位于剪辑区域内的一个小红色圆圈。The result is one small red circle, which is within the clip region. span.span: Gets an array of objects, each of which bounds a range of character positions within the specified string.

returns.span: 此方法返回 对象的数组，其中每个对象将字符位置的范围限定在指定字符串内。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法返回的区域是依赖于解决方案的，因此，如果在一种解析中将字符串记录在图元文件中，并且以后以其他分辨率播放，则可能会稍微降低准确性。The regions returned by this method are resolution-dependent, so there might be a slight loss of accuracy if strings are recorded in a metafile at one resolution and later played back at a different resolution. ## Examples 下面的代码示例旨在与 Windows 窗体一起使用，并且它需要作为 `e` 事件处理程序的参数。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 此代码执行以下操作：The code performs the following actions: - 设置字符串 "第一和第二范围" 和用于显示字符串 ( "New Roman"，16磅) 的字体。Sets a string "First and Second ranges" and a font for display of the string ("Times New Roman", 16 point). - 将字符串中的两个字符范围设置为与单词 "First" 和 "Second" ) 对应的 (。Sets two character ranges within the string (which correspond to the words "First" and "Second"). - 创建一个要在其中显示字符串的矩形。Creates a rectangle in which to display the string. - 设置字符串3/4 的格式设置，包括两个字符范围。Sets the formatting of the string ¾ including the two character ranges. - 在屏幕上绘制字符串。Draws the string to the screen. - 度量字符范围，确定绑定两个指定范围的矩形。Measures the character ranges, determines rectangles that bound the two specified ranges. - 在屏幕上绘制两个矩形。Draws the two rectangles to the screen. 结果是显示的字符串，其中第一个范围 ( "First" ) 由红色矩形包围，第二个范围 ( "Second" ) 用蓝色矩形进行限制。The result is the displayed string with the first range ("First") bounded by a red rectangle and the second range ("Second") bounded by a blue rectangle. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法旨在用于单个字符串，并包括在字符串前后的少量额外空间，以允许延伸的字形。The method is designed for use with individual strings and includes a small amount of extra space before and after the string to allow for overhanging glyphs. 此外，此 方法会调整标志符号点以优化显示质量，并显示比报告的字符串窄 。Also, the method adjusts glyph points to optimize display quality and might display a string narrower than reported by . 若要获取适用于布局中相邻字符串的指标 (例如，在实现格式化文本) 时，请使用 方法或采用的方法之一， 并传递 。To obtain metrics suitable for adjacent strings in layout (for example, when implementing formatted text), use the method or one of the methods that takes a , and pass . 此外，请确保的 为 。Also, ensure the for the is . ## Examples 下面的代码示例旨在与 Windows 窗体一起使用，并且它需要作为 `e` 事件处理程序的参数。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 此代码执行以下操作：The code performs the following actions: - 创建要测量的字符串。Creates a string to measure. - 创建字体对象并将其设置为 Arial (16 点) 。Creates a font object and sets it to Arial (16 point). - 创建一个大小对象，并使用它和 font 对象来度量字符串的大小。Creates a size object and uses it and the font object to measure the size of the string. - 使用度量的字符串大小绘制红色矩形。Draws a red rectangle using the measured size of the string. - 在绘制的矩形内绘制字符串。Draws the string within the drawn rectangle. remarks.format: ## Remarks `width`参数指定返回的 结构 () 的宽度分量的最大值 。The `width` parameter specifies the maximum value of the width component of the returned structure (). 如果 `width` 参数小于字符串的实际宽度，则返回的组件将被 截断为一个值，该值表示将在指定宽度内容纳的最大字符数。If the `width` parameter is less than the actual width of the string, the returned component is truncated to a value representing the maximum number of characters that will fit within the specified width. 为了容纳整个字符串，返回的 组件将调整为允许使用字符换行显示字符串的值。To accommodate the entire string, the returned component is adjusted to a value that allows displaying the string with character wrap. 方法旨在用于单个字符串，并包括在字符串前后的少量额外空间，以允许延伸的字形。The method is designed for use with individual strings and includes a small amount of extra space before and after the string to allow for overhanging glyphs. 此外，此 方法会调整标志符号点以优化显示质量，并显示比报告的字符串窄 。Also, the method adjusts glyph points to optimize display quality and might display a string narrower than reported by . 若要获取适用于布局中相邻字符串的指标 (例如，在实现格式化文本) 时，请使用 方法或采用的方法之一， 并传递 。To obtain metrics suitable for adjacent strings in layout (for example, when implementing formatted text), use the method or one of the methods that takes a , and pass . 此外，请确保的 为 。Also, ensure the for the is . ## Examples 下面的代码示例旨在与 Windows 窗体一起使用，并且它需要作为 `e` 事件处理程序的参数。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 此代码执行以下操作：The code performs the following actions: - 创建要度量的字符串，并将字体对象设置为 Arial (16 点) 。Creates a string to measure and a font object set to Arial (16 point). - 设置字符串的最大宽度。Sets the maximum width of the string. - 创建一个大小对象并使用它、字体对象和最大字符串宽度来度量字符串的大小。Creates a size object and uses it, the font object, and the maximum string width to measure the size of the string. - 使用度量的字符串大小绘制红色矩形。Draws a red rectangle using the measured size of the string. - 在绘制的矩形内绘制字符串。Draws the string within the drawn rectangle. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法将参数指定的矩阵前面预置 `matrix` ，使结果为 `matrix` x 世界转换。This method prepends the matrix specified by the `matrix` parameter, so that the result is `matrix` x world transformation. ## Examples 下面的代码示例旨在与 Windows 窗体一起使用，并且它需要作为 `e` 事件处理程序的参数。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 此代码执行以下操作：The code performs the following actions: - 创建一个 `transformMatrix` 矩阵 (两个按两个恒等矩阵再加上一个零平移矢量) 。Creates a `transformMatrix` matrix (a two by two identity matrix plus a zero-translation vector). - 按向量 (200，100) 转换变换矩阵。Translates the transform matrix by a vector (200, 100). - 将 Windows 窗体的世界变换矩阵旋转30度，将30度的旋转矩阵向窗体的变换矩阵前面进行旋转。Rotates the world transformation matrix of the Windows Form by 30 degrees, prepends the rotation matrix for 30 degrees to the form's transformation matrix. - 将旋转世界变换矩阵乘以平移的 `transformMatrix` ，并将其前面预置 `transformMatrix` 到世界变换矩阵。Multiplies the rotated world transformation matrix by the translated `transformMatrix`, and prepends the `transformMatrix` to the world transformation matrix. - 绘制旋转的平移椭圆。Draws a rotated, translated ellipse. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3#143](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3/CPP/form1.cpp#143)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3#143](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3/CS/form1.cs#143)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3#143](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3/VB/form1.vb#143)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 参数的值 `order` 指定乘法的顺序为 `matrix` x 世界转换。A value of for the `order` parameter specifies that the order of the multiplication is `matrix` x world transformation. 的值 `order` 指定乘法的顺序为世界转换 x `matrix` 。A value of for `order` specifies that the order of the multiplication is world transformation x `matrix`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例旨在与 Windows 窗体一起使用，并且它需要作为 `e` 事件处理程序的参数。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 此代码执行以下操作：The code performs the following actions: - 创建一个 `transformMatrix` 矩阵 (两个按两个恒等矩阵再加上一个零平移矢量) 。Creates a `transformMatrix` matrix (a two by two identity matrix plus a zero-translation vector). - 按向量 (200，100) 转换变换矩阵。Translates the transform matrix by a vector (200, 100). - 将 Windows 窗体的世界变换矩阵旋转30度，将30度的旋转矩阵追加到窗体的变换矩阵。Rotates the world transformation matrix of the Windows Form by 30 degrees, prepending the rotation matrix for 30 degrees to the form's transformation matrix. - 将旋转世界变换矩阵乘以平移的 `transformMatrix` ，并将追加 `transformMatrix` 到世界变换矩阵。Multiplies the rotated world transformation matrix by the translated `transformMatrix`, appending the `transformMatrix` to the world transformation matrix. - 绘制旋转的平移椭圆。Draws a rotated, translated ellipse. summary.span: 释放通过以前对此 的 方法的调用获得的设备上下文句柄。

span.span: Releases a device context handle obtained by a previous call to the method of this .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设备上下文是基于的 Windows 结构 [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)] ，定义了一组图形对象及其关联的属性，以及影响输出的图形模式。The device context is a Windows structure based on [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)] that defines a set of graphical objects and their associated attributes, as well as the graphical modes that affect output. 对 和方法的调用 必须成对出现。Calls to the and methods must appear in pairs. 在和方法对的作用域中 ，通常只调用 [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)] 函数。During the scope of a and method pair, you usually make calls only to [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)] functions. 对于生成参数的的方法，此范围内的调用 [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)] 将 `hdc` 失败，并出现 `ObjectBusy` 错误。Calls in that scope made to [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)] methods of the that produced the `hdc` parameter fail with an `ObjectBusy` error. 此外， [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)] 将忽略 `hdc` 在后续操作中对参数的进行的任何状态更改。Also, [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)] ignores any state changes made to the of the `hdc` parameter in subsequent operations. ## Examples 下面的代码示例旨在与 Windows 窗体一起使用，并且它需要作为 `e` 事件处理程序的参数。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 该示例演示如何调用 Windows [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)] 函数以执行与方法相同的任务 [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)] 。The example illustrates calling a Windows [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)] function to perform the same task as a [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)] method. 此代码执行以下操作：The code performs the following actions: - 定义 gdi32.dll 的 WINDOWS DLL 文件的互操作性特性。Defines the interoperability attribute for the Windows DLL file gdi32.dll. 此 DLL 包含所需的 [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)] 函数，并将 该 dll 中的函数定义为 external。This DLL contains the desired [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)] function, and it defines the function in that DLL as external. - 创建红色笔。Creates a red pen. - 使用笔在屏幕上使用方法绘制一个矩形 [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)] 。With the pen, draws a rectangle to the screen using the [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)] method. - 定义内部指针类型变量 `hdc` ，并将其值设置为窗体的设备上下文的句柄。Defines an internal pointer type variable `hdc` and sets its value to the handle to the device context of the form. - 使用函数在屏幕上绘制矩形 [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)] 。Draws a rectangle to the screen using the [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)] function. - 释放参数所表示的设备上下文 `hdc` 。Releases the device context represented by the `hdc` parameter. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3#145](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3/CPP/form1.cpp#145)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3#145](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3/CS/form1.cs#145)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3#145](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3/VB/form1.vb#145)]

summary.span: 将此 的剪辑区域重置为无限区域。

span.span: Resets the clip region of this to an infinite region.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果的剪辑区域 是无限的，则不会剪辑此绘图的项 。When the clipping region of a is infinite, items that this draws are not clipped. ## Examples 下面的代码示例旨在与 Windows 窗体一起使用，并且它需要作为 `e` 事件处理程序的参数。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 此代码执行以下操作：The code performs the following actions: - 创建 (0，0) 左上角的矩形，并将该剪辑区域设置为此矩形。Creates a rectangle with upper-left corner at (0, 0) and sets the clipping region to this rectangle. - 创建 (100，100) 左上角的第二个矩形，并将该剪辑区域设置为在第一个矩形) (的当前剪辑区域。Creates a second rectangle with upper-left corner at (100, 100) and sets the clipping region to the intersection of this rectangle and the current clipping region (the first rectangle). - 使用纯蓝色画笔填充包含上一个矩形的大矩形。Fills a large rectangle that includes both previous rectangles with a solid blue brush. - 将剪辑区域重置为无限。Resets the clipping region to infinite. - 在两个剪辑区域周围绘制矩形;它对第一个剪辑矩形使用黑色钢笔，为第二个剪辑区域使用一个红笔。Draws rectangles around the two clipping regions; it uses a black pen for the first clipping rectangle and a red pen for the second clipping region. 结果是，只有两个矩形的交集用蓝色填充。The result is that only the intersection of the two rectangles is filled with blue. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3#146](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3/CPP/form1.cpp#146)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3#146](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3/CS/form1.cs#146)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3#146](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3/VB/form1.vb#146)]

summary.span: 将此 的世界变换矩阵重置为单位矩阵。

span.span: Resets the world transformation matrix of this to the identity matrix.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 标识矩阵表示无缩放、旋转或平移的转换。The identity matrix represents a transformation with no scaling, rotation, or translation. 将此的世界变换重置 为恒等矩阵意味着其世界变换不会更改转换项的几何。Resetting the world transformation of this to the identity matrix means that its world transformation does not change the geometry of transformed items. ## Examples 下面的代码示例旨在与 Windows 窗体一起使用，并且它需要作为 `e` 事件处理程序的参数。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 此代码执行以下操作：The code performs the following actions: - 将 Windows 窗体的世界变换转换为 (100，0) 的矢量。Translates the world transform of the Windows Form by a vector (100, 0). - 保存窗体的图形状态。Saves the graphics state of the form. - 将窗体的世界变换重置为一个标识，并使用纯红色画笔填充矩形。Resets the world transform of the form to an identity and fills a rectangle with a solid red brush. - 还原已转换的图形状态并使用纯色纯色画笔填充矩形。Restores the translated graphics state and fills a rectangle with a solid blue brush. 结果是一个未转换的红色实心矩形和一个已转换的蓝色填充矩形。The result is an untranslated red-filled rectangle and a translated blue-filled rectangle. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3#147](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3/CPP/form1.cpp#147)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3#147](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3/CS/form1.cs#147)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3#147](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3/VB/form1.vb#147)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用的方法时 ，保存的状态的信息块将 放在堆栈上。When you call the method of a , an information block that holds the state of the is put on a stack. 方法返回 标识该信息块的。The method returns a that identifies that information block. 将标识传递 到 方法时，将从堆栈中移除信息块，并使用将 其还原到在方法调用时它所处的状态 。When you pass the identifying to the method, the information block is removed from the stack and is used to restore the to the state it was in at the time of the method call. 请注意， 给定调用方法返回的 仅可向方法传递一次 `Restore` 。Note that the returned by a given call to the method can be passed only once to the `Restore` method. 对方法的调用 可以嵌套; 也就是说，在 调用方法之前，可以多次调用方法 。Calls to the method can be nested; that is, you can call the method several times before you call the method. 每次调用方法时 ，都会将信息块放在堆栈上，并收到 信息块的。Each time you call the method, an information block is put on the stack, and you receive a for the information block. 将其中一个对象传递给 方法时，将 返回到它在 方法调用时返回该特定的状态 。When you pass one of those objects to the method, the is returned to the state it was in at the time of the method call that returned that particular . 从堆栈中删除由该方法调用放置在堆栈上的信息块 ，并且 也会删除该方法调用之后置于该堆栈上的所有信息块。The information block placed on the stack by that method call is removed from the stack, and all information blocks placed on that stack after that method call are also removed. 调用方法会 将信息块放在与调用方法相同的堆栈上 。Calls to the method place information blocks on the same stack as calls to the method. 正如 调用与调用配对一样 ， 方法调用与 方法调用配对。Just as a call is paired with a call, a method call is paired with a method call. 当你调用 方法时，将 从堆栈中移除在调用方法后，由方法或方法) 放置在堆栈 (的所有信息块。When you call the method, all information blocks placed on the stack (by the method or by the method) after the corresponding call to the method are removed from the stack. 同样，在调用方法时 ，通过方法) 或方法调用的堆栈上放置的所有信息块 ( 将从堆栈中移除。Likewise, when you call the method, all information blocks placed on the stack (by the method or by the method) after the corresponding call to the method are removed from the stack. ## Examples 下面的代码示例旨在与 Windows 窗体一起使用，并且它需要作为 `e` 事件处理程序的参数。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 此代码执行以下操作：The code performs the following actions: - 将 Windows 窗体的世界变换转换为 (100，0) 的矢量。Translates the world transform of the Windows Form by a vector (100, 0). - 保存窗体的图形状态。Saves the graphics state of the form. - 将窗体的世界变换重置为一个标识，并使用纯红色画笔填充矩形。Resets the world transform of the form to an identity and fills a rectangle with a solid red brush. - 还原已转换的图形状态，并使用纯色的蓝色画笔填充第二个矩形。Restores the translated graphics state and fills a second rectangle with a solid blue brush. 结果是一个未转换的红色实心矩形和一个已转换的蓝色填充矩形。The result is an untranslated red-filled rectangle and a translated blue-filled rectangle. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3#148](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3/CPP/form1.cpp#148)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3#148](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3/CS/form1.cs#148)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3#148](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3/VB/form1.vb#148)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 旋转操作包括将变换矩阵乘以其元素派生自参数的矩阵 `angle` 。The rotation operation consists of multiplying the transformation matrix by a matrix whose elements are derived from the `angle` parameter. 此方法通过将旋转附加到变换矩阵来应用旋转。This method applies the rotation by prepending it to the transformation matrix. ## Examples 下面的代码示例旨在与 Windows 窗体一起使用，并且它需要作为 `e` 事件处理程序的参数。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 此代码执行以下操作：The code performs the following actions: - 使用向量 (100，0) 转换 Windows 窗体的世界变换矩阵。Translates the world transformation matrix of the Windows Form by the vector (100, 0). - 将世界变换旋转30度，将旋转矩阵追加到世界变换矩阵。Rotates the world transformation by an angle of 30 degrees, prepending the rotation matrix to the world transformation matrix. - 使用蓝色笔绘制旋转的平移椭圆。Draws a rotated, translated ellipse with a blue pen. returns.span: 此方法返回 ，该对象表示此 的保存状态。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用的方法时 ，保存的状态的信息块将 放在堆栈上。When you call the method of a , an information block that holds the state of the is put on a stack. 方法返回 标识该信息块的。The method returns a that identifies that information block. 将标识传递 到 方法时，将从堆栈中移除信息块，并使用将 其还原到在方法调用时它所处的状态 。When you pass the identifying to the method, the information block is removed from the stack and is used to restore the to the state it was in at the time of the method call. 请注意， 给定调用方法返回的 仅可向方法传递一次 。Note that the returned by a given call to the method can be passed only once to the method. 对方法的调用 可以嵌套; 也就是说，在 调用方法之前，可以多次调用方法 。Calls to the method can be nested; that is, you can call the method several times before you call the method. 每次调用方法时 ，都会将信息块放在堆栈上，并收到 信息块的。Each time you call the method, an information block is put on the stack, and you receive a for the information block. 将其中一个对象传递给 方法时，将 返回到它在 方法调用时返回该特定的状态 。When you pass one of those objects to the method, the is returned to the state it was in at the time of the method call that returned that particular . 从堆栈中删除由该方法调用放置在堆栈上的信息块 ，并且 也会删除该方法调用之后置于该堆栈上的所有信息块。The information block placed on the stack by that method call is removed from the stack, and all information blocks placed on that stack after that method call are also removed. 调用方法会 将信息块放在与调用方法相同的堆栈上 。Calls to the method place information blocks on the same stack as calls to the method. 正如 调用与调用配对一样 ， 方法调用与 方法调用配对。Just as a call is paired with a call, a method call is paired with a method call. 当你调用 方法时，将 从堆栈中移除在调用方法后，由方法或方法) 放置在堆栈 (的所有信息块。When you call the method, all information blocks placed on the stack (by the method or by the method) after the corresponding call to the method are removed from the stack. 同样，在调用方法时 ，通过方法) 或方法调用的堆栈上放置的所有信息块 ( 将从堆栈中移除。Likewise, When you call the method, all information blocks placed on the stack (by the method or by the method) after the corresponding call to the method are removed from the stack. ## Examples 下面的代码示例旨在与 Windows 窗体一起使用，并且它需要作为 `e` 事件处理程序的参数。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 此代码执行以下操作：The code performs the following actions: - 将 Windows 窗体的世界变换转换为 (100，0) 的矢量。Translates the world transform of the Windows Form by a vector (100, 0). - 保存窗体的图形状态。Saves the graphics state of the form. - 将窗体的世界变换重置为标识 (2x2 恒等矩阵和零矢量平移) 并使用纯红色画笔填充矩形。Resets the world transform of the form to an identity (2x2 identity matrix plus a zero-vector translation) and fills a rectangle with a solid red brush. - 还原已转换的图形状态并使用纯色纯色画笔填充矩形。Restores the translated graphics state and fills a rectangle with a solid blue brush. 结果是左侧的未转换红色实心矩形和窗体右侧的已转换蓝色实心矩形。The result is an untranslated red-filled rectangle on the left and a translated blue-filled rectangle on the right of the form. remarks.format: ## Remarks 缩放操作包含将变换矩阵乘以其元素 (`sx` ，，1) 的对角矩阵相乘 `sy` 。The scaling operation consists of multiplying the transformation matrix by a diagonal matrix whose elements are (`sx`, `sy`, 1). 此方法将按缩放矩阵将的变换矩阵左乘 。This method prepends the transformation matrix of the by the scaling matrix. ## Examples 下面的代码示例旨在与 Windows 窗体一起使用，并且它需要作为 `e` 事件处理程序的参数。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 此代码执行以下操作：The code performs the following actions: - 将 Windows 窗体的世界变换矩阵旋转30度。Rotates the world transformation matrix of the Windows Form by 30 degrees. - 通过预先计算缩放转换，可在 x 方向上按比例缩放该矩阵，并按 y 方向缩放1。Scales that matrix by a factor of 3 in the x direction and a factor of 1 in the y direction by prepending the scaling transformation. - 使用蓝色笔绘制经过缩放的旋转矩形。Draws a scaled, rotated rectangle with a blue pen. 结果仍是一个矩形。The result is still a rectangle. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果参数表示的图形路径 `path` 未闭合，则从最后一个点向第一个点添加一个附加线段，以关闭路径。If the graphics path represented by the `path` parameter is not closed, an additional segment is added from the last point to the first point to close the path. ## Examples 下面的代码示例旨在与 Windows 窗体一起使用，并且它需要作为 `e` 事件处理程序的参数。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 此代码执行以下操作：The code performs the following actions: - 创建一个图形路径，并将一个椭圆添加到该路径。Creates a graphics path and adds an ellipse to the path. - 将剪辑区域设置为椭圆路径。Sets the clipping region to the elliptical path. - 使用纯黑色画笔填充大矩形。Fills a large rectangle with a solid black brush. 结果是实心的黑色椭圆。The result is a filled, black ellipse. remarks.format: ## Remarks 平滑模式指定线条、曲线和填充区域的边缘是否使用平滑处理 (也称为抗锯齿) 。The smoothing mode specifies whether lines, curves, and the edges of filled areas use smoothing (also called antialiasing). 一个例外是，路径渐变画笔不遵循平滑模式。One exception is that path gradient brushes do not obey the smoothing mode. 使用填充的区域以 (化名) 的方式呈现，而与 属性无关。Areas filled using a are rendered the same way (aliased) regardless of the property. ## Examples 下面的方法演示设置 、和属性的效果 。The following method demonstrates the effects of setting the , , and properties. 下图显示了该示例的输出。The output of the example is shown in the following illustration. ![应用和没有应用平滑效果的线条。](~/add/media/gdi-smoothingmode.png "应用和没有应用平滑效果的线条。")![Lines with and without smoothing applied.](~/add/media/gdi-smoothingmode.png "Lines with and without smoothing applied.") 此示例旨在与 Windows 窗体一起使用。This example is designed to be used with Windows Forms. 将代码粘贴到窗体中，并 `ShowPensAndSmoothingMode` 在处理窗体事件时调用方法，并将 `e` 作为传递 。Paste the code into a form and call the `ShowPensAndSmoothingMode` method when handling the form's event, passing `e` as . remarks.format: ## Remarks 伽玛更正值必须介于0到12之间。The gamma correction value must be between 0 and 12. 默认值为 4。The default value is 4. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 和 属性。The following code example demonstrates the use of the and properties. 此示例旨在与 Windows 窗体一起使用。This example is designed to be used with Windows Forms. 将代码粘贴到窗体中，并 `ChangeTextRenderingHintAndTextContrast` 在处理窗体事件时调用方法，并将 `e` 作为传递 。Paste the code into a form and call the `ChangeTextRenderingHintAndTextContrast` method when handling the form's event, passing `e` as . summary.span: 获取或设置此 的几何世界转换的副本。

span.span: Gets or sets a copy of the geometric world transformation for this .

value.span: 一个 副本，表示此 的几何世界转换。

span.span: A copy of the that represents the geometric world transformation for this .

remarks.format: ## Remarks GDI + 使用三个坐标空间： "世界"、"页面" 和 "设备"。GDI+ uses three coordinate spaces: world, page, and device. 世界坐标是用于对特定图形世界进行建模的坐标，是您传递到 .NET Framework 中的方法的坐标。World coordinates are the coordinates used to model a particular graphic world and are the coordinates you pass to methods in the .NET Framework. 页面坐标指的是绘图图面的坐标系统，如窗体或控件。Page coordinates refer to the coordinate system used by a drawing surface, such as a form or a control. 设备坐标是在其上绘制的物理设备（如屏幕或打印机）所使用的坐标。Device coordinates are the coordinates used by the physical device being drawn on, such as a screen or a printer. 属性表示世界转换，该转换将世界坐标映射到页面坐标。The property represents the world transformation, which maps world coordinates to page coordinates. 由于由属性返回的矩阵 是几何转换的副本，因此，当您不再需要矩阵时，您应该释放它。Because the matrix returned and by the property is a copy of the geometric transform, you should dispose of the matrix when you no longer need it.

span.span: Types of Coordinate Systems

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例旨在与 Windows 窗体一起使用，并且它需要作为 `e` 事件处理程序的参数。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 此代码执行以下操作：The code performs the following actions: - 创建两个点并在它们之间绘制一条蓝线。Creates two points and draws a blue line between them. - 将世界变换设置为在 x 方向上按金额40转换，在 y 方向设置为30。Sets the world transform to translate by amounts 40 in the x direction and 30 in the y direction. - 将从世界坐标 () 转换 为页面坐标 () 。Transforms the points from world coordinates () to page coordinates (). - 将世界变换重置为标识。Resets the world transformation to the identity. - 在转换后的点之间绘制一条红线。Draws a red line between the transformed points. 结果是一条蓝线和下面的已转换红色线条。The result is a blue line and a translated red line below it. summary.span: 通过使此 的转换矩阵左乘指定的平移来更改坐标系统的原点。

span.span: Changes the origin of the coordinate system by prepending the specified translation to the transformation matrix of this .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 原点通常是绘图图面的左上角。The origin is typically the upper-left-hand corner of the drawing surface. 转换操作包括将变换矩阵乘以其平移部分为 `dx` 和参数的矩阵 `dy` 。The translation operation consists of multiplying the transformation matrix by a matrix whose translation part is the `dx` and `dy` parameters. 此方法通过将平移矩阵附加到变换矩阵来应用翻译。This method applies the translation by prepending the translation matrix to the transformation matrix. ## Examples 下面的代码示例旨在与 Windows 窗体一起使用，并且它需要作为 `e` 事件处理程序的参数。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 此代码执行以下操作：The code performs the following actions: - 将 Windows 窗体的世界变换矩阵旋转30.0。Rotates the world transformation matrix of the Windows Form by 30.0F degrees. - 通过调用移动图形对象的源 ，并将转换附加到变换矩阵。Moves the origin of the graphics object by calling , prepending the translation to the transformation matrix. - 使用蓝色笔绘制平移旋转椭圆。Draws a translated, rotated ellipse with a blue pen. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3#167](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3/CPP/form1.cpp#167)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3#167](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3/CS/form1.cs#167)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3#167](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3/VB/form1.vb#167)] 下图显示了运行前一个代码示例的输出。The following illustration shows the output of running the previous code example. ![经过平移和转换的椭圆](~/add/media/ndp-tranlatetransform.png "经过平移和转换的椭圆")![Translated and transformed ellipse](~/add/media/ndp-tranlatetransform.png "Translated and transformed ellipse")

remarks.format: ## Remarks 转换操作包括将变换矩阵乘以其平移部分为 `dx` 和参数的矩阵 `dy` 。The translation operation consists of multiplying the transformation matrix by a matrix whose translation part is the `dx` and `dy` parameters. 此方法根据参数在转换矩阵前面添加或追加变换矩阵 `order` 。This method prepends or appends the transformation matrix of the by the translation matrix according to the `order` parameter. ## Examples 下面的代码示例旨在与 Windows 窗体一起使用，并且它需要作为 `e` 事件处理程序的参数。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 此代码执行以下操作：The code performs the following actions: - 将 Windows 窗体的世界变换矩阵旋转30.0。Rotates the world transformation matrix of the Windows Form by 30.0F degrees. - 通过调用移动图形对象原点，将 平移追加到世界变换矩阵。Moves the graphics object's origin by calling , appending the translation to the world transformation matrix. - 使用蓝色笔绘制旋转的平移椭圆。Draws a rotated, translated ellipse with a blue pen. summary.span: 获取此 的可见剪辑区域的边框。

span.span: Gets the bounding rectangle of the visible clipping region of this .

value.span: 一个 结构，它表示此 的可见剪辑区域的边框。

span.span: A structure that represents a bounding rectangle for the visible clipping region of this .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 生成矩形的单位由 属性指定。The unit for resulting rectangle is designated by the property. 默认单位是像素。The default unit is pixels. 通常与控件相关联，矩形的原点将相对于该控件的工作区。A is typically associated with a control and the origin of the rectangle will be relative to the client area of that control. 可见剪辑区域是此的剪辑区域 与窗口的剪辑区域的交集。The visible clipping region is the intersection of the clipping region of this and the clipping region of the window.
